plot: The show follows three best friends, Jack, Fitz and Emmy through their trials and tribulation as out of work actors in the New York City independent arts scene as they try to "make it" and find their place in the world.
plot_en: The show follows three best friends, Jack, Fitz and Emmy through their trials and tribulation as out of work actors in the New York City independent arts scene as they try to "make it" and find their place in the world.
plot_es: The show follows three best friends, Jack, Fitz and Emmy through their trials and tribulation as out of work actors in the New York City independent arts scene as they try to "make it" and find their place in the world.
title: Places Please
